items.sentence: If my house were a mansion, I would invite everyone I know to my birthday party.
If students today had more free time, they might show more interest in politics.
I don\'t know what this tree is called, but there are a lot of them around here.
I have a bottle of very good wine that I\'ve been saving for a special occasion.
Tom probably has better things to do with his time than sit in meetings all day.
